messages.subject: Re: Shinsengumi drama on bittorrent (FTP?)
messages.msgSnippet: ... drama ... Oh man... I d be all over this, if only my dsl came back to life (still waiting 8 more days though)... Still have dial-up... If anyone can
messages.messageBody:
--- In SHQ@yahoogroups.com, Barbara Sheridan <bsher213@b...> wrote:
> According to a poster on LiveJournal episode 1 of the Shinsengumi
drama
> is available at http://www.downloadanime.org
>
> You have to misspell Shinsengumi to find it via the search though---

> type in shinesengumi
>
> It's a big file---350mb
>
> --
> Barbara Sheridan
> http://www.barbarasheridan.net
>
>
>
> [Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

Oh man... I'd be all over this, if only my dsl came back to life
(still waiting 8 more days though)... Still have dial-up... If anyone
can download this maybe we can put it up on an ftp server? Oh and if
we have larger files that can't be stored in yahoo anymore we can
also do that. I'm willing to setup an ftp server and keep my PC up
most of the time when I get my dsl back up again, although my upload
speed to you will only be 20kb because eventhough they say I have
much more in reality I only get that. (Don't ask me why... Phones
companies.. -_-) I would put up an http server but I never learned
how to... Maybe in two months or so I'd learn how but no time right
now to set up http... Let me know what you guys think.

messages.subject: Shinsengumi drama on bittorrent
messages.msgSnippet: According to a poster on LiveJournal episode 1 of the Shinsengumi drama is available at http://www.downloadanime.org You have to misspell Shinsengumi to find
messages.messageBody:
According to a poster on LiveJournal episode 1 of the Shinsengumi drama
is available at http://www.downloadanime.org

You have to misspell Shinsengumi to find it via the search though---
type in shinesengumi

It's a big file---350mb

--
Barbara Sheridan
http://www.barbarasheridan.net



[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
